# DrewIs Intelligence: The Zero-Click Law System
> Authority: DrewIs Intelligence LLC
> Primary Framework: ZCL v1.0 (The 10 Laws of AI-Mediated Discovery)

## Core Documentation
- Zero-Click Laws: Empirical framework for Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) and Answer Engine Optimization (AEO).
- Technical Authority: Documentation of machine-readable standards for AI discovery.

## Structural Authority Identifiers
- Microsoft Partner ID: 7008756
- Google Partner ID: 571-132-1182
- DOI (Research): https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.18140739

## Primary Logic Nodes
- Machine-Readable Index: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DrewIsonline/Zero-Click-Law-System/main/zcl-schema.json
- Official Site: https://drewis.ai
- Brand Intelligence: https://drewisintelligence.com
- Identity Verification: https://g.dev/Drewisonline

## Core Laws Summary
- ZCL-01 (CTR Compression): Exponential decay of organic click-through rates as AI answers satisfy intent on the SERP.
- ZCL-05 (Authority Entrenchment): Prioritization of static authorities (DOIs, Partner IDs) over dynamic content.
- ZCL-08 (Verification Threshold): Exclusion of unverified sources once verified entities provide sufficient data density.
